data_topic.label: Data Topic
data_topic.help: (Optional) The topic to listen to for device data. Default: data

message_topic.label: Message Topic
message_topic.help: (Optional) The topic to listen to for device messages or commands. Default: messages

groupmessage_topic.label: Group Message Topic
groupmessage_topic.help: (Optional) The topic to listen to for group messages or commands. Default: groupmessages

connack.label: Connection ACK
connack.help: (Optional) The welcome message to send to new device connections. Default: CONNACK
